department: \u2018Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)'
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.  All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 10 January 2024 at 14:00 EST.  All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
description: The Department of National Defence requires the following promotional items for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), as detailed in Annex \"A\" Statement of Work.  These promotional items will be used to support local, regional, provincial, and international events and activities supported by, or organized by, the Royal Canadian Air Force.
full_summary:
Title: W3373-230001 Promotional Items Request for Proposal (RFP)

Publication Date: December 21, 2023

Closing Date and Time: January 10, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EST
Amendment Date: January 4, 2024

Contact Information:

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Procurement Category Group: Goods and Services
* Procurement Category Code: GD
* Process Type: Acquire through Proposal Solicitation
* Notification Type: Request for Proposal

Scope of Work:

The Department of National Defence requires promotional items for the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF), detailed in Annex “A” Statement of Work. These items will support local, regional, provincial, and international events and activities.

Proposal Requirements:

* Response to the RFP must be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada's Ariba Discovery platform.
* A bid submission must be received by January 10, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST to be considered responsive.
* All required supporting documentation must be included with the proposal submission.
* Proposals submitted after the closing date and time will be declared non-responsive.

Selection Criteria:

The proposal will be evaluated based on the combined rating of technical merit and price.

Pre-Qualification:

Vendors must be pre-qualified on the Government of Canada's supplier database, Supplier Registration System, at the time of proposal submission.

Award Criteria:

The award will be made to the bidder who has achieved the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.

 
Deliverables

* Pro forma invoice, stating total value, including all levies and charges
* Details of the workscope, outlining what the work entails, scope of work and timeline
* Process in non-technical terms and recommended lists of standard condition agreements in place


Annex A:

`insert annex A with date specific information`

Trade Agreements:
 
This procurement agreement is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Pease follow all the requirements accordingly for compliance.

Authorized officers

AIP

 Deputy Purchasing and Contracting for Ottawa.

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


# Tender Notice

## W3373-230001 Promotional Items Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Publication Date: December 21, 2023

### Closing Date and Time: January 10,
